Author : Robin Camarasa

Institution : Erasmus Medical Center

Position : PhD student

Contact : r.camarasa@erasmusmc.nl

Date : 2019-11-28

Project : data_science_framework

** File that contains the main loggers **

data_science_framework.data_spy.loggers.experiment_loggers.global_logger(folder: str, project_root: str, tag: str = 'experiment', test: bool = False)[source]¶

Function that return a decorator that logs the experiments parameters and the output of the experiment

Parameters

  • folder – Path to the folder that contains the experiments

  • project_root – Root of the project (for github logs)

  • tag – Tag associated with the experiment

  • test – Boolean that is true only if the experiment is a test

Returns

Decorator

data_science_framework.data_spy.loggers.experiment_loggers.metric_logger(f)[source]¶

Decorator that logs a metric

Parameters

f – Decorated function

Returns

Decorated function

f – Function to time
